mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE PR_STD_CTG_HIERARCHY AS /* prStdCtg.getPrStdCtgListWithHierarchy */ ( SELECT 1 AS LEVEL , STD_CTG_NO , STD_CTG_NM , LEAF_CTG_YN , USE_YN , SORT_SEQ , UPR_STD_CTG_NO , STD_LRG_CTG_NO , STD_MID_CTG_NO , STD_SML_CTG_NO , STD_THN_CTG_NO , MD_ID , SAFE_CERTI_NEED_YN , GOODS_NOTI_LISART_CD , CONCAT('\',SORT_SEQ||STD_CTG_NO) AS HIERARCHY , CONCAT('',STD_CTG_NM) AS HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM PR_STD_CTG A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND UPR_STD_CTG_NO = '0' UNION ALL SELECT LEVEL + 1 , T1.STD_CTG_NO , T1.STD_CTG_NM , T1.LEAF_CTG_YN , T1.USE_YN , T1.SORT_SEQ , T1.UPR_STD_CTG_NO , T1.STD_LRG_CTG_NO , T1.STD_MID_CTG_NO , T1.STD_SML_CTG_NO , T1.STD_THN_CTG_NO , T1.MD_ID , T1.SAFE_CERTI_NEED_YN , T1.GOODS_NOTI_LISART_CD , CONCAT_WS('\', T2.HIERARCHY, TRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.SORT_SEQ,'000'))||T1.STD_CTG_NO) AS HIERARCHY , CONCAT('',T2.HIERARCHY_TEXT,'>'||T1.std_ctg_nm) AS HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM PR_STD_CTG T1, PR_STD_CTG_HIERARCHY T2 WHERE T2.STD_CTG_NO = T1.UPR_STD_CTG_NO ) SELECT LEVEL , STD_CTG_NO , STD_CTG_NM , LEAF_CTG_YN , USE_YN , SORT_SEQ , UPR_STD_CTG_NO , STD_LRG_CTG_NO , STD_MID_CTG_NO , STD_SML_CTG_NO , STD_THN_CTG_NO , MD_ID , SAFE_CERTI_NEED_YN , GOODS_NOTI_LISART_CD , HIERARCHY , HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM PR_STD_CTG_HIERARCHY ORDER BY HIERARCHY

SELECT /* prStdCtg.getStandardCategoryInfo */ SC1.STD_CTG_NO , SC1.STD_CTG_NM , SC1.UPR_STD_CTG_NO , SC2.STD_CTG_NM AS UPR_STD_CTG_NM , SC1.USE_YN , SC1.SORT_SEQ , SC1.LEAF_CTG_YN , SC1.SAFE_CERTI_NEED_YN , SC1.MD_ID , UB.USER_NM AS MD_NM , SC1.GOODS_NOTI_LISART_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR012', SC1.GOODS_NOTI_LISART_CD) AS GOODS_NOTI_LISART_CD_NM , SC1.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SC1.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_STD_CTG SC1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_USER_BASE UB ON (SC1.MD_ID = UB.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PR_STD_CTG SC2 ON (SC1.UPR_STD_CTG_NO = SC2.STD_CTG_NO) WHERE SC1.STD_CTG_NO = #{stdCtgNo}
SELECT /* prStdCtg.getStandardCategoryMgmtChildListCount */ COUNT(*) FROM PR_STD_CTG SC WHERE SC.UPR_STD_CTG_NO = #{stdCtgNo}

SELECT /* prStdCtg.getStandardCategoryMgmtChildList */ SC.STD_CTG_NO , SC.STD_CTG_NM , SC.USE_YN , SC.SORT_SEQ , SC.LEAF_CTG_YN , SC.UPR_STD_CTG_NO , SC.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SC.SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SC.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SC.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM , CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM PR_STD_CTG PSC WHERE PSC.UPR_STD_CTG_NO IN (SC.STD_CTG_NO) ) THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END LEAF_CTG_YN_CHANGE_POSSIBLE FROM PR_STD_CTG SC WHERE SC.UPR_STD_CTG_NO = #{stdCtgNo} ORDER BY SC.SORT_SEQ
SELECT /* prStdCtg.getStandardCategoryMgmtGoodsListCount */ COUNT(*) FROM PR_GOODS_BASE GB WHERE GB.STD_CTG_NO = #{stdCtgNo}

SELECT /* prStdCtg.getStandardCategoryMgmtGoodsList */ GOODS_NO , GOODS_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR005',SALE_STAT_CD) AS SALE_STAT_CD_NM FROM PR_GOODS_BASE GB WHERE GB.STD_CTG_NO = #{stdCtgNo} ORDER BY GB.GOODS_NO
SELECT /* prStdCtg.getStandardCategoryDisplayListCount */ COUNT(*) FROM PR_STD_CTG_DISP_INFO DI WHERE DI.STD_CTG_NO = #{stdCtgNo}
